alert.note: Alert for Merced (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 29 at 4:57PM PDT until March 29 at 5:30PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hanford CA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Merced County in central California... * Until 530 PM PDT. * At 455 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Atwater, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and accumulating hail up to penny size. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Merced, Atwater, Livingston and Winton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
